title: Young Lions
description: Young Lions is a story about human beings falling in and out of love with themselves, each other, and the world around them. Recently awarded the highly coveted Xeric grant for self publishing, it is the debut graphic novella from blogger/zinester Blaise Larmee. "Blaise Larmee is making thoughtful, refreshing, beautiful comics that you can drink with your eyes." - David Heatley, Author of My Brain Is Hanging Upside Down
author: Blaise Larmee
